meanings.definition: A wheel that is turned by hand to control the movement of a machine or device.
meanings.sent1: The handwheel on the machine helped adjust the speed easily.
meanings.sent2: He gripped the handwheel tightly to steer the boat in the right direction.
meanings.sent3: The handwheel spun so fast that it looked like a whirligig!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the handwheel that drove her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The shiny handwheel gleamed under the sunlight, beckoning to be turned.

meanings.definition: A circular device with a handle used for manual operation.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic used the handwheel to tighten the bolts securely.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the height of the chair using the handwheel beneath the seat.
meanings.sent3: The handwheel was so squeaky that it sounded like a chirping bird!
meanings.sent4: His mind was the handwheel that controlled his actions and decisions.
meanings.sent5: With a firm grip, she turned the handwheel smoothly, feeling the mechanism engage.
